semanticPatch.suggestedFixDescription: This is only breaking if you at any point check for the .bot property to be false, for some result where a non-bot browser was found. Meaning changing "result.bot == false" to "!result.bot" should fix this issure. For a further explanation see: https://github.com/DamonOehlman/detect-browser/releases/tag/4.0.0
semanticPatch.unknownAccessPathQuestion: Is .bot a property on a result from the detect-browser?
